mapper.insert: insert into t_finance(id,grade,name, area,money,day, principal,interest,serviceMoney, capitalMoney,type,archivesMoney, sum,time,types, audit_id,s_id,landMoney, gpsMoney,stopMoney,jindiMoney, fileMoney,elseMoney,businessType, receiptType,formergrade,houseProperty, account) values(null,#{grade},#{name}, #{area},#{money},#{day}, #{principal},#{interest},#{serviceMoney}, #{capitalMoney},#{type},#{archivesMoney}, #{sum},now(),#{types}, #{audit_id},#{s_id},#{landMoney}, #{gpsMoney},#{stopMoney},#{jindiMoney}, #{fileMoney},#{elseMoney},#{businessType}, #{receiptType},#{formergrade},#{houseProperty}, #{account})
